com.imdb.dbvaluator

Class AbstractDBValuator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.imdb.dbvaluator.AbstractDBValuator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectorDBValuator, EpisodeDBValuator, GenreDBValuator, PersonCategoryDBValuator, PersonDBValuator, RatingDBValuator, TitleDBValuator, WriterDBValuator

    public abstract class AbstractDBValuator
extends java.lang.Object
    AbstractDBValuator is a abstract class. It is used for both populate and retrieval operations to & from the database table. If say TITLE DB table needs to be populated. It will require a corresponding, say TitleDBValuator Populate operation is performed by MySQLStore.populateUsingBatchInsert(ArrayList, int, AbstractDBValuator) Retrieval operatrion is performed by MySQLStore as well
